Name: require_product_owner_assigned
Description: Each project must have a product owner

Name: ensure_team_has_scrum_master
Description: Every team must be supported by a Scrum Master

Name: enforce_sprint_duration_limit
Description: All sprints must not exceed 30 days

Name: limit_work_in_progress
Description: Maximum 5 tasks can be in 'in-progress' state at once

Name: require_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: All user stories must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: prevent_duplicate_worker_emails
Description: No two workers should share the same email

Name: enforce_task_belongs_to_story
Description: Each task must belong to exactly one user story

Name: ensure_feature_priority_defined
Description: All features must have a non-null priority

Name: require_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: limit_worker_to_one_team
Description: Each worker can belong to only one team

Name: enforce_unique_project_names
Description: Project names must be unique across all projects

Name: ensure_blocker_has_severity
Description: All blockers must have a severity level

Name: require_velocity_calculation
Description: Each team must have an associated velocity
